comment:
>>44507775

“Relax, girl.” The Queen shrugs her off. “Perhaps you might better persuade me in person to break my little oath with him. But if you believe you’re going to do it by force, you are sadly mistaken. Now, Averron: as we speak, my Regent is at work organizing maps, blueprints, and other relevant information that might be of use to you. We’ll be in touch in the coming days—once your Guardian has had time to cool off—should you desire to make contact so we might begin our journey to the surface together. For now, though, farewell, and best of luck in your endeavors…”

The line abruptly cuts, her video transmission fading away with the sweep of a vertical scan line.

“I think we’ve seen all we need to know that our sister cities are incompetent at best and enemies at worst.” Liza says, turning toward the exit. She pauses, then addresses Andor and Ayla. “I think it’s important that we finalize the Alliance merger before we put the excavation plans back into motion. The message boards are back online—that means watch them. I’m calling for a meeting soon, to discuss the upcoming merger, and the question of our foreign policy.”

“Great,” Andor says. “Sven will be happy to hear it, and I’m sure the rest of our officers will too. I’ll tell him to get a hold of you.”

“Yeah,” Ayla says, “Fantastic.”
name: BSO
